title: TRON: Ares ‚Äì The First Trailer Will Be Released Tomorrow
description: After teasing the film at CinemaCon earlier this week, Disney has announced that the first trailer for TRON: Ares will be released tomorrow.
author: Kaitlyn Booth
excerpt: Disney closed out CinemaCon earlier this week with a massive laser light show and an extended trailer for TRON: Ares. We got the chance to see some footage from this film back in August at D23, but Disney has been keeping this one pretty close to the chest so far. However, it seems we will finally [‚Ä¶]
text: Posted in: Disney, Movies | Tagged: Tron: AresAfter teasing the film at CinemaCon earlier this week, Disney has announced that the first trailer for TRON: Ares will be released tomorrow.Article Summary Disney set to release TRON: Ares trailer following CinemaCon teaser. Nine Inch Nails provides the film's anticipated soundtrack. Fans eager for more details and visuals from TRON: Ares. Highly anticipated film opens in U.S. theaters on October 10, 2025. Disney closed out CinemaCon earlier this week with a massive laser light show and an extended trailer for¬†TRON: Ares. We got the chance to see some footage from this film back in August at D23, but Disney has been keeping this one pretty close to the chest so far. However, it seems we will finally get something released to the public. The studio shared a very short promo today announcing that the first trailer will be released tomorrow. It probably won't be the same one we saw at CinemaCon, closer to the teaser we saw back in August, in the sense that it's probably not going to tell us much, but the big thing will be the music. It very much sounded like we got a teaser of what Nine Inch Nails is bringing to the table in that extended trailer. Hopefully, we'll get a taste of that trailer tomorrow. Hopefully, we'll get a poster, more images, and a more detailed one-pager. Both times I have seen footage for this film, the crowd has seemed super into it, but I'm sure people seemed super into the early footage of TRON: Legacy, too, and we all saw how that worked out. Jared Leto as Ares in Disney's TRON: ARES. Photo Courtesy of Disney. ¬© 2024 Disney Enterprises, Inc. All Rights Reserved. TRON: Ares: Summary, Cast List, Release Date TRON: Ares¬†follows a highly sophisticated Program, Ares, who is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission, marking humankind's first encounter with A.I. beings. The feature film is directed by Joachim R√∏nning and stars Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Evan Peters, Hasan Minhaj, Jodie Turner-Smith, Arturo Castro, Cameron Monaghan, with Gillian Anderson, and Jeff Bridges. Sean Bailey, Jeffrey Silver, Justin Springer, Jared Leto, Emma Ludbrook and Steven Lisberger are the producers, with Russell Allen serving as executive producer. Disney's TRON: Ares¬†releases in U.S. theaters on October 10, 2025. Enjoyed this? Please share on social media! Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today! html:
Posted in: Disney, Movies | Tagged: Tron: Ares

After teasing the film at CinemaCon earlier this week, Disney has announced that the first trailer for TRON: Ares will be released tomorrow.

Article Summary

  • Disney set to release TRON: Ares trailer following CinemaCon teaser.
  • Nine Inch Nails provides the film's anticipated soundtrack.
  • Fans eager for more details and visuals from TRON: Ares.
  • Highly anticipated film opens in U.S. theaters on October 10, 2025.

Disney closed out CinemaCon earlier this week with a massive laser light show and an extended trailer for¬†TRON: Ares. We got the chance to see some footage from this film back in August at D23, but Disney has been keeping this one pretty close to the chest so far. However, it seems we will finally get something released to the public. The studio shared a very short promo today announcing that the first trailer will be released tomorrow. It probably won't be the same one we saw at CinemaCon, closer to the teaser we saw back in August, in the sense that it's probably not going to tell us much, but the big thing will be the music. It very much sounded like we got a teaser of what Nine Inch Nails is bringing to the table in that extended trailer. Hopefully, we'll get a taste of that trailer tomorrow. Hopefully, we'll get a poster, more images, and a more detailed one-pager. Both times I have seen footage for this film, the crowd has seemed super into it, but I'm sure people seemed super into the early footage of TRON: Legacy, too, and we all saw how that worked out.

TRON: Ares: Summary, Cast List, Release Date

TRON: Ares¬†follows a highly sophisticated Program, Ares, who is sent from the digital world into the real world on a dangerous mission, marking humankind's first encounter with A.I. beings.

The feature film is directed by Joachim R√∏nning and stars Jared Leto, Greta Lee, Evan Peters, Hasan Minhaj, Jodie Turner-Smith, Arturo Castro, Cameron Monaghan, with Gillian Anderson, and Jeff Bridges.

Sean Bailey, Jeffrey Silver, Justin Springer, Jared Leto, Emma Ludbrook and Steven Lisberger are the producers, with Russell Allen serving as executive producer.

Disney's TRON: Ares¬†releases in U.S. theaters on October 10, 2025.

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

About Kaitlyn Booth

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.
